Server Requirement

Bono framework has a few system requirement, which is :

  • Web Server (Apache, Nginx, LigHttpd, dll)
  • PHP 5.4+
  • MongoDB
  • PAS (Pacakges Generator)
  • Composer PHP
  • PHP Phar Extension


How to

Bono framework has a few system requirement, which is :

  • Web Server (Apache, Nginx, LigHttpd, dll)
  • PHP 5.4+
  • MongoDB
  • PAS (Pacakges Generator)
  • Composer PHP
  • PHP Phar Extension
